p: In this present study, it was revealed that a study of the effect of the extracts on fasting blood sugar levels of diabetic rats is shown in Table 3. As indicated, the treatment of ALX-induced diabetic rats with graded doses of the root extract caused a significant ( p < 0.05) decrease in the animals' blood sugar concentration. At postinduction, the measurement of the blood glucose levels was on the high side.
